name: Droplet & Stone
description:
Droplet and Stone is a co-operative 3D platformer in which players must work together to solve puzzles and challenges using their respective abilities.

A sorcerer foresees a coming threat that would disrupt the balance of the realm, and creates two creatures from water and stone to deal with this. Named Droplet and Stone, this duo must work together in taking on a perilous journey across the realm.

Controls:

Stone:

     Move: WASD

     Interact: T

Droplet:

     Move: Arrow keys

     Interact : O

     Jump: I
